posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 14586987', 'Rent: $2,300 / Month', 'Beds: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 9/1/2022', 'Parking:: street parking', 'WE HAVE THE LARGEST EXCLUSIVE RENTAL INVENTORY IN THE NORTH END.', 'Core Property Group – 278 North Street Boston, MA 02113 - Open 7 Days a Week', 'MONEY DUE UP FRONT', 'FIRST MONTH: $2300', 'SECURITY DEPOSIT:  $2300', 'BROKER FEE: $2300', 'NO VIDEO SHOWINGS.', 'MUST BE SEEN IN PERSON.', 'NO EXCEPTIONS', 'PERFECT NORTH END 1 BEDROOM', 'North End 1 Bedroom with Great Layout', '$2300', '9/1/2022', 'Central Air', 'Renovated Kitchen with Breakfast Bar', 'Dishwasher/Disposal', 'Hardwood floors throughout unit', 'Open Living Area with Exposed Brick', 'Laundry in Building', 'Professionally Managed', 'EASY TO SHOW', 'FEATURES', 'Close Proximity to Major Transportation Points', 'Close to Downtown Boston', 'Close to Financial District', 'Close to Government Center', 'Close to Haymarket', 'Close to North Station', 'Close to T', 'Completely Renovated Building', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Laundry in Building', 'Modern Kitchen', 'New/Renovated Bath', 'Professionally Managed', 'Quiet Street', '.', 'SALES...', 'Thinking of Buying or Selling??', 'Call today and LETS TALK.', ' I handle Condo & Multi Family Sales throughout the Downtown Boston Area.', '.', 'I mainly cover the North End, Beacon Hill, Back Bay, Downtown/Fidi, Seaport, South Boston, Charlestown & West End.', '.', 'Please contact Zach to Discuss ALL AVAILABILITY including OFF MARKET LISTINGS.', 'Please Call, Text, Email, or DM', 'Zach Barron', 'Core Property Group', 'Vice President', '617-939-1078', 'Instagram: @real_estate_barron', 'zbarron <URL>', '*** BROKERS:', 'THIS LISTING IS NOT A CO-BROKE ***', 'All Information should be verified.', 'The apartments advertised may be rented.', 'Core Property Group is an "Equal Housing Opportunity" Real Estate Company.']
